nodes.text: Joh'Cire was a desert moon located in the Mid Rim. During the time of the Galactic Republic, the moon had a growing population and moisture farming industry. In return for irrigation technology, Joh'Cire provided credits to the planet Bromlarch as part of the Mid Rim Cooperation motion, which was introduced to the Galactic Senate by Senator Padmé Amidala in 28 BBY. The credits supplied by Joh'Cire were used to purchase permacrete for repairing the damage caused by groundquakes on Bromlarch.
Joh'Cire was mentioned in Queen's Shadow, a 2019 novel written by E. K. Johnston.
